headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chiri muAmerica, VaNdenda, Vobata Pamwe neMasangano Akawanda muKusimudzira Vechidiki neNharaunda kuZimbabwe
text: Muchirongwa chedu chatinotarisa zviri kuitwa nevana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika, svondo rino tine hurukuro naVaInnocent Ndenda vari mudunhu reTexas muAmerica asi vachibva kuHwedza mudunhu reMashonaland East. VaNdenda, avo vakaenda kuAmerica muna 2016, vanoti kunyange hazvo vachishanda samaneja pane imwe kambani kwakare kuTexas, vakaramba vachienderera mberi nemabasa avo avaiita vachiri kumusha, ekubatsira vanoshaya pamwe nekusimudzira nharaunda yavanobva. Pari zvino vanoti vari kushanda nemasangano matatu anoti reMubatirapamwe Trust, iro rinobatsira vanenge vachishandisa zvinodhaka, reMakoni North District Association, rakanangana nenyaya dzebudiriro, pamwe nereGlobal Exchange Program, iro rinobatanidza vanhu vanobva kunyika dzakasiyanasiyana. VaNdenda vanoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuona vana veZimbabwe vachiisa misoro pamwe vosiyana nehumbimbindoga, vachiti chose chinezwi rekuti kubatana chinobudirira. Vanoti ivowo vane shuviro yekuti vange vachizorangarirwawo mune remangwana semunhu akabatsira mukushanda nevamwe kubatanidza vanhu kuti vavandudze magariro avo. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weNamibia, VaHage Geingob, Vanovhura ZITF Vachikurudzira Kudyidzana kweZimbabwe neNamibia
text: Mutungamiri weNamibia, VaHage Geingob, vanoti kudyidzana pakati peNamibia neZimbabwe munyaya dzemabhizimisi kwakaderera vachiti kudyidzana uku kunofanirwa kukwira. Vachivhura ZITF yegore rino zviri pamutemo, VaGeingob vati mugore rapfuura Namibia yakatenga kubva kuZimbabwe zvinhu zvemari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemana emadhora. Vati kudyidzana pakati peNamibia neZimbabwe uye pakati penyika dzemuAfrica kunofanirwa kukwira vachiti kuita izvi kunobatsirawo kusimudzira hupfumi henyika idzi. VaGeingob vati Namibia ichiri yakatarisana nedambudziko munyaya yekugovewa kweivhu vakati nyika yavo inogona kudzidza zvakawanda kubva mukugadziriswa kwakaitwa nyaya iyi muZimbabwe vachiti kugadzirisa nyaya iyi kunobatsira kurwisa hurombo hune veruzhinji. Vati hurmende yavo yakatanga chirongwa chavakati "Harambe" senzira yekurwisa hurombo uye kusimudzira hupenyu hweveruzhinji munyika mavo. VaGeingob vati vemakambani vanofanirwa kuita zvemabhizimisi vasina kungonangana nekuwana mari chete, asi kubatsirawo kurwisa hurombo. Vasati vatura mashoko avo, VaGeingob vamboshanyira nzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana muZITF pamwe nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vachiona zviri kuratidzwa pachirongwa ichi. Nyika gumi neina chete ndidzo dzange dziine makambani adzo achiratidza zvigadzirwa paZITF yegore rino. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inonyorerana Chibvumirano neKambani yeKunze Kuti Ishambadze Marasha
text: Hurumende yanyorerana chibvumirano neimwe kambani yekunze kwenyika kuitira kuti ibatsirwe mukutengesa marasha kunyika dzakaita seIndia neJapan. Vachitaura pakunyoreranwa kwechibvumirano ichi ne Victoria Consulting, gurukota rinoona nezvezvicherwa, VaWinston Chitando, vati donzvo rehurumende nderekuti nyika iwanirwe kwekutengesera marasha kuIndia uye kuitira kuti iwane mari yekushandisa mukuchera marasha aya. VaChitando vati Zimbabwe inofungidzirwa kuti ine marasha anosvika mabhiriyoni makumi maviri nemashanu ematani asi pagore kuri kucherwa matani ari pakati pemamiriyoni maviri nemamiriyoni matatu. VaChitando vatiwo India ndiyo inotenga marasha akawanda pagore zvichienzaniswa nedzimwe nyika. Vachitaura pamusangano mumweyo, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vati Zimbabwe inofanirwa kutora mukana wekudyidzana wakanaka uripo pakati payo neIndia. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kuziva kuti kambani yeVictoria Consulting yakamboshanda nenyika dzipi, uye kuti vakuru vayo ndivanani. Asi vaimbove mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvezvicherwa muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaGift Chimanikire, vati havaoni kuti zvakanaka kuti Zimbabwe itsvage misika yekutengesera marasha kunze kwenyika, ipo pari zvino kusiri kucherwa marasha anokwana munyika. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vatiwo havaoni zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe itsvake kambani yekunze inonotsvakira Zimbabwe misika yemarasha. VaMuchichwa vatiwo zviri nani kuti kushandiswe hukama hwagara huripo nedzimwe nyika. Dandemudande rebazi rezvezvicherwa rinoti Zimbabwe ine marasha akanaka, uye ine nzvimbo makumi maviri nepfumbamwe dzine marasha. Makambani maviri chete munyika, Hwange Colliery neMakomo Resources, ndiwo ari kunyanyochera marasha. No media source currently available

headline: VaMasaraure Vanoti Havasi Kuzorega Kurwira Mihoro Yakakwana yeVarairidzi
text: Mutungamiriri wesangano rinomiririra varairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, avo vakapambwa nevanhu vatanhatu pakati pehusiku, vanoti vakarohwa zvakaipisisa, uye vakatorerwa mbatya dzavainge vakapfeka. VaMasaraure vanoti vakakuvadzwa mumusoro, kumusana, maoko nemakumbo, vachiti vamwe vevanhu vakavapamba ndevamwe vechikwata chakambovapamba muna Ndira gore rino, vachiti izvi hazvisi kuzovadzorerwa sure mukurwira kodzero dzevarairiridzi. VaMasaraure vanoti hurumende yave kutora vanorwira kodzero dzevashandi sevavengi vachiti hapana anoda kupidigura hurumende asi kuti vanhu vanoda kuti vakwanise kuriritira mhuri dzavo. VaMasaraure vaudza Studio7 kuti vaudzwa navana chiremba kuti vambozorora kuenda kubasa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, kuti tinzwe pamire hurumende panyaya yekupambwa kwava Masaraure sezvo vanga vasingadaire nharembozha yavo. headline: Rimwe Sangano reVarimi Rotsigira Hurongwa hweKubhadhara Vachena Vakatorerwa Minda
text: Rimwe sangano revarimi reZimbabwe Farmers Union (ZFU), rinoti rinotambira nemufaro hurongwa hwehurumende hwekuti varimi vatema vari mumapurazi akatorerwa vachena vabhadhare mitero ichashandiswa mukuripa vachena ava budiriro dzavakanga vaita pamapurazi avo. Mukuru weZFU, VaPaul Zakariya vanoti kubhadhara zvivakwa nebudiriro zvakasiya zvaitwa nevachena ava kunopa varimi vechitema ava chiremera chekuti vakabhadhara zvavari kushandisa, kwete kuti vakaita zvekubvuta. “Handiona sekuti chingave chinhu chingaremera vanhu kuti vave ne ownership yakadzika pamusoro peminda yavanenge vachishandisa. Idanho rinokwanisa kuti ritipe chiremera munharaunda yatinogara uyewo nepasi rose kuti vakanga varipo paminda iyoyo vakabhadharwa,” VaZakariya vanodaro. VaZakariya vanoti kubhadhara kwavari kuita mari idzi kuburikidza nemitero iri kubhadhariswa varimi vakagariswa patsva ava hakusi kuti vari kutenga ivhu ravari kurima kwete. “Varimiri vanenge vachibhadhara zvivakwa nebudiriro dzakaitwa nevachena ava, kwete kuti tiri kutenga ivhu redu, kwete.” Mukutanga kwemwedzi uno gurukota rezveupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa vakazivisa kuti hurumende yakanga yave kutanga kuita ongororo mumapurazi kuti ione kukosha kwakaita budiriro dzakasiiwa nevachena vakatorerwa mapurazi ava. Vakati izvi ndizvo zvinozovapa ruzivo rwekuti murimi oga oga obhadhara marii, uye murimi wechichena akabviswa papurazi apa anozopiwawo marii. Kutanga muna 2000, vachena vanodarika zviuru zvina vanonzi vakabviswa zvine chisimba pamapurazi avo achipiwa kune vatema, asi minda mizhinji yakararira nekuda kwekushaiwa zvikwanisiro kwevarimi vatsva ava. headline: Doctor Manyika veBuild Zimbabwe Vokurudzira Kuti Vanhu Vasakanganwa Kwavakabva
text: Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, Doctor Noah Manyika vanogara kuCharlotte, kuNorth Carolina muAmerica vari kuita zvakawanda kukurudzira vana veZimbabwe, vangave kumusha kana kunze kwenyika, kuti vavake nyika yechipikirwa. Doctor Manyika vanoshanda nesangano reBuild Zimbabwe, iro vakavamba vaine chinangwa chekuti vabatsire vana nezvipfeko, mabhuku pamwe nevirongwa zvinorodza pfungwa. Asi vanoti vakazorivhurirawo kune vamwe vana veZimbabwe kuti vaite mubata pamwe semajuru mukuumba nyika. "Build Zimbabwe chirongwa chandaiita makore gumi nemashanu adarika nechinangwa chekuti Zimbabwe ibudirire kana munhu wese akawana chaanoita mukuvaka nyika. Asi ndakazoti, kwete, kwete, regai ndidaidzed vamwe vana veZimbabwe tivake tiri pamwechete," vanodaro Doctor Manyika. Vanoti sangano ravo iri rine zvirongwa zvakawanda zvariri kuita mumatunhu akasiyanasiyana enyika, zvinosanganisira kuvaka dzimba dzine mitengo yepasi mumaguta ari munyika senzira yekubatsira vanhu vakawanda kuti vawane pekugara pakakodzera. headline: Hurumende Inokurudzirwa Kutsigira, Kusimbaradza Mari Itsva
text: Bhanga guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, razivisa kuti richadhinda mari itsva ichange ichishandiswa mumabhanga serimwe rematanho ariri kutora mukugadzirisa nyaya yekushomeka kwemari munyika, pamwe nekugadzirisa zvinhu mumabhanga nemisika yemari munyika. Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, vanodzidzisa zvemabhizimusi paDevry University ku Ohio, vanoti vanhu vanoda mari yavanoshandisa, naizvozvo danho ratorwa neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe idanho rakanaka kana hurumende ikatevedzera mitemo nemirairo yezvehupfumi hwenyika inotevedzwa nenyika dzepasi pose, kwete zvokuzoramba ichidhinda mari pavanenge vazvifunga. Muzvinafundo Masocha vati hurumende inofanirwa kuratidza vanhu kuti inovimbika kwete kudhinda mari nguva dzese zvinozokonzera kuti mari yacho ishaye huremerera. "Vanhu vanoda kuona mari yavo mumavoko kwete kuudzwa kuti iri mukati mefoni yavanoshandisa, saka kana hurumende ikaunza mari iyi vanhu vangafara nekuti zvema RTGS hazvisi zvinovafadza. Asi hurumende inosungirwavo kuchengetedza chiremera chemari iyi nekurega zvekuzodhindadhinda mari sezvayaimboita makore apfuura," Professor Masocha vaudza Studio 7. headline: Sangano reProudly263 Global Robatsira Vana veZimbabwe Vari Kunze Kutanga Mabhizimusi
text: Sangano reProudly263 Global, iro rakaumbwa nezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa mushure mekunge zvaona kuoma kwakaita kutanga mabhizimusi kana usiri chizvarwa chenyika iyi, riri kubatsira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika pamwe nezviri munyika nemikana yekutanga mabhizimusi azvo zvega. Vakavamba sangano iri uye vari ivo CEO veProudly263 Global, VaStanley Makwara, vanoti vakaonawo kubatana kwezvimwe zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika zviri muSouth Africa, uye kutsigirana kwazvinoita mune zvemabhizimusi, izvo zvakaita kuti vati kana vana veZimbabwe vanozvigonawo. VaMakwara vanoti chinangwa chesangano ravo, iro rave nenhengo dzinodarika zviuru zvitatu, ndechekusimudzira mabhizimusi nemagariro evanhu kuburikidza nekubatana vachizivana. Vanotiwo seProudly263 Global, vakaumbawo bhanga rinonzi Hello Sahwira Mhlobo (HSM Bank), rinove remubatanidzwa wezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa, mushure mekuona kunetsa kwazvinoita kuti munhu ange achikwanisa kukwereteswa mari nemabhanga emo yekuti atange bhizimusi. VaMakwara vanoti bhanga ravo rinokurudzira kuchengetedza mari uye rinowanisa nhengo dzaro zvikwereti zvine mutengo wakaderera kudarika kumamwe mabhanga. Vanoti remangwana resangano ravo rakajeka zvekuti vanoona vana veZimbabwe vari kunze vachikwanisa kuvaka upfumi hweZimbabwe ivo vari kunyika dzavagere. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe neGermany Dzoronga Kuumba Komisheni Inoona nezveKusimbaradza Hukama
text: Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakasangana neChipiri negurukota rekuGermany rinoona nezvekudyidzana munyaya dzehupfumi pamwe nebudiriro, VaGerd Muller, vakabvumirana kuumba komisheni ichaone nezvekusimbaradza hukama nekudyidzana pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mushure memusangano wavo, VaChinamasa vakati vafara kushanyirwa naVaMuller. Vakati vatura nyaya dzakawanda dzinosanganisira kudyidzana kwenyika mbiri idzi, chikwereti cheZimbabwe kuGermany, zvirango zvehupfumi pamwe nekuti Zimbabwe itange zvekare kuwana rutsigiro rwemari nehunyanzvi kubva kuGermany. Vakatiwo vakazeya zvimwe zvingaitwe neZimbabwe kuti ikwanise kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kune dzimwe nyika nemasangano epasi rose pamwe nekuti igadziridze hukama hwayo nenyika dzepasi rose. VaChinaamasa vakati vakabvumiranawo kushanda pamwe chete panyaya yekudzidzisa vanhu zvidzidzo zvemabasa emaoko kana kuti vocational training nechinangwa chekuti vanhu vakwanise kuzvishandira pamwe nekupinza vamwe mabasa. Zimbabwe yakatarirwa zvirango zvehupfumi nenyika dzekumavirira dzakaita seAmerica, Australia nenyika dzekuEurope nekuda kwehutongi hwehudzvanyiriri, kutyora kodzeo dzevanhu pamwe nekuita sarudzo dzisina kujeka. VaMuller vakati vakafara kuuya kuZimbabwe mushure mekunge Zimbabwe yagadza mutungamiriri mutsva zvichitevera sarudzo dzemwedzi wapfuura idzo dzakazosimbiswawo nedare repamusororo munyika. Vakati zvakakosha kuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaite zvakavimbisa kuita zvekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu kusanganisira mapato anopikisa pamwe nekuremekedza nekutevedza mitongo yematare edzimhosva. VaMuller vakati Germany nedunhu rese reEurope vanoda runyaro muZimbabwe ndosaka vachida kuti VaMnangagwa vaite zvavakavimbisa. Vakatiwo Germany inoda kuona hupenyu nehupfumi hwevanhu vekumaruwa huchisimudzirwa ndosaka iri kuda kushanda neZimbabwe mukusimudzira ruzivo rwevanhu pamabasa emaoko. Vakatiwo Joint Commission yavachaumba neZimbabwe ichazeya zvese zvingaitwe uye kuti Germany ingabatsirei sei vanhu vemuZimbabwe kuti vabudirire. Zvichakadai, nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo dzinoti kunyange hazvo makurukota aVaMnangagwa ari kuramba achiita basa rawo, ari kuita izvi zviri kunze kwemutemo sezvo mutemo uchiti zvigaro zvavo zvinopera panogadzwa mutungamiri wenyika mushure mesarudzopapera. Izvi zviri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika pasi paSection 108 (1) (c). VaMnangagwa vakagadzwa kuve mutungamiriri wenyika nesvondo uye havasati vadoma dare remakurukota avo. headline: Dunhu reGauteng Roronga Kudzika Mitemo Inosarura Vabvakure
text: Mukuru wedunhu reGauteng muJohannesburg, VaDavid Makhura, vakazivisa neChipiri kuti nekufamba kwenguva, dunhu ravo richadzika mutemo unorambidza vekune dzimwe nyika kutanga mabhizimisi mudunhu ravo, sezvo izvi zviri kutadzisa zvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa, kuti zviwanewo chekubata. VaMakhura vakataura mashoko aya mudare ravo redunhu, apo vakange vachipindura mibvunzo yaibva kune dzimwe nhengo dzedare ravo. Vanoona nezvekodzero dzavanhu vanoti mashoko akataurwa naVaMakhura anokonzeresa kuti pave neruvengo pakati pevanobva kunze kwenyika nezvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa. Mumwe muzvinabhizimusi muSouth Africa neZimbabwe, VaBrighton Sangore, vanoti mashoko akadai anobata zvizvarwa zvisiri zvemuSouth Africa, agara achitaurwa kwenguva yakareba muSouth Africa. Sachigaro weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti mashoko akadai haafanirwe kunge achibva pamuromo pemunhu anonyarikana saVaMakhura. VaMavhinga vanoti mashoko aVaMakhura anotyora kodzero dzevanhu uye handicho chaive chido chevaimbove mutungamiri weSouth Africa, mushakabvu Nelson Mandela. Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum, VaGabriel Shumba, vanotiwo mashoko aVaMakhura anotyora mitemo yenyika, iyo isina rusarura pakuvambwa kwemabhizinesi. VaShumba vanoti kana vekunze vachivhura mabhizimusi muSouth Africa, vanenge vachibatsira kusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika iyi. VaShumba vanoti VaMakhura vanofanirwa kukumbira ruregerero kuzvizvarwa zvose zvekune dzimwe nyika zviri muSouth Africa. VaShumba vanoti sangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum riri kuita hurukuro nemamwe masangano akasiyanasiyana, senzira yekugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa. Mashoko aVaMakhura anouya mushure mokunge zvitoro zvezvizvarwa zvekunze kweSouth Africa zvapazwa nekupiswa, ukuwo vatyairi vemagonyeti vachimbunyikidzwa kodzero dzavo, vamwe vachimanikidzwa kusiya basa nesangano rinozviti All Truck Drivers Foundation. Sangano reHuman Rights Watch rinoti vanhu mazana maviri vafa mumhirizhonga yemuSouth Africa kubva muna Kurume gore rapera, vazhinji vavo vari vatyairi vanobva kune dzimwe nyika. headline: Vanhu Vashanu Vopora Kubva kuCoronavirus muBulawayo
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muZimbabwe hwasvika pamakumi mashanu nevatanhatu kuti 56. Asi vamwe vanhu vashanu kuBulawayo vapora kubva kuhutachiona uhu zvichireva kuti munyika yose vanhu makumi maviri nevatu vapora. Vanhu vafa vachiri vana. Vanhu vari kurwara makumi maviri nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 29. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzeezvehutano dziri kuyambira kuti kushaikwa kwezvikwanisiro zvekuvheneka vanhu vane chirwere ichi kana kuti matest kits kunoreva kuti vanhu vanoona kunge vari kuparadzira chirwere ichi vasingazive nekuti kue vamwe vanhu vanogona kunge vasingakosore kana kupisa muviri asi vachitapurira chirwere. Gurukuta rinoona nezvehutano Doctor Obadiah Moyo vakatenda kuti nyika yave kupererwa nezvekuvheneka vanhu. Vamwe vakabva kunze kwenyika vachimbochengetwa munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana vanoti vave kunzi vabhadhare mari dzinodarika madhora makumi matanhatu nemashanu ekuAmerica kuti vavhenekwe hutachiona uhu. Asi munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter kuti hurumende haibhadharose vanhu kunze kwekunga huri hurongwa hwavo vega. Mukuru musangano reCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vanoti danho rehurumende rekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba pasina guva yakatarwa harisi kushanda. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zvuru zana kana kuti 100 000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica uye vashaya vadarika zvuru zvitatu nemazana maviri anemakumi mana nevatanhatu kana kuti 3.246. Vapora vanodarika zvuru zvina nezviviri kana kuti 42, 000 Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni mashanu nezvuru mazana matatu kana kuti 5, 3 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuamerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezvuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 1,6 million. Vanhu vafa muAmerica vave kuda kusvika pazvuru zana kana kuti 100 000. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika zvuru mazana matatu 300 000 asi vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni maviri kana kuti 2 million. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Gumi neVashanu (15) Vofa neCovid-19 neMugovera
text: Vanhu gumi nevashanu kana kuti 15 vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika neMugovera vamwe mazana masere nenakumi matatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 839 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave mazana mana nemakumu masere nevatatu kana kuti 483. Vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kuparira gore rapera vave zvuru makumi maviri nemazana mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 20, 499. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vave zviuru gumi bezviviri zvine mazana mana nemakumi matatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 12, 439 zvichitevera kupora kwevanhu mazana maviri nemamakumi mashanu nevashanu nezuro. Vanhu vachiri kurwara vanosvika zvuru zvinomwe nemazana mashanu ane makumi manomwe nevanomwe kana kuti 7, 577. Kunyangwe muHarare nemuBulawayo muri imo mune vanhu vakawandisa vari kurwara, huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi mumatunhu ose hwawedzera zvave kutyisa kana nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano. Mukuru mubazi rezvirwere zvekutapuriranwa Dr Portia Manangazira vanoti svondo rino hurumende iri kutarisira ongororo inobuditsa pachena kuti kufa nekubatwa kwevanhu nechirwere ichi kuri kukonzerwa nekamwe kamhando katsva kechirwere ichi kakabatwa kuSouth Africa neBritain uye kanzoni kanopararira zvakanyanya kana muvana. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu kana kuti 3 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zviuru makumi manomwe nemaviri zvine zana nemakumi maviri nerimwe kana kuti 72,121. Vapora vadarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana mana kana kuti 2,4 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Dunhu reSADC ndirozve rine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 1,3 million. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi masere nemapfumbamwe ane zviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 89, 7 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zvuru mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nemaviri kana kuti 372, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemaviri kana kuti 22 miillion. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 1, 9 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi mana nemapfumbamwe ane zviuru zvisere kana kuti 49, 8 million.

headline: Musangano weInternational AIDS Conference Wotanga muSouth Africa
text: Musangano wemazuva mashanu weInternational Aids Conference wakatanga muDurban South Africane musi weMuvhuro uye uchapera nemusi weChishanu. Musangano uyu uri kuzeya nyaya dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheHIV/AIDS uye kuti potsvagwa sei mari yekuita izvi. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa ndivo vavhura musangano uyu zviri pamutemo. VaRamaphosa vakurudzira nyika dzepasi rino nemasangano akazvipira kuti vabatane mukurwisa denda iri. Vamwe vanyarikani vari pamusangani uyu vanosanganisa munyori mukuru weUnited Nation VaBan Ki Moon, vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica, muimbi Elton John uye Nevanzi wamambo kana kuti Prince Harry vekuBritain. Musangano uyu wakarongwa nesangano reInternational Aids Society uye unounza pamwe chete nyanzvi dzinosvika zviuru gumi nenomwe kubva kunyika dzose dzepasi rino. Nyanzvi idzi dzinenge dzichiisa misoro pamwe chete kuti dzibatsirane kurwisa denda iri iro rauraya vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi matatu mumakore makumi matatu nemashanu. Vari kutungamira Zimbabwe kumusangano uyu igurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa avo vanoti Zimbabwe iri kuda kuvhara maburi ose angaite kuti vanhu vatsva vatapurirwe chirwere cheHIV. Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kumusangano uyu zvinosanganisirawo VaDaniel Molokele vanova mukuru wesangano reAIDS Accountability International avo vanoti Zimbabwe ichabatsirikana nekuve pamusangano uyu. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nasachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Network for Positive Women Amai Martha Tolana vati kunze kwekunzwa zviri kuitwa nevamwe, nyika ichagovawo zvairi kuita. Sangano reUnited Nations rinoti rinoda kupedza mukondombera panosvika gore ra2030 uye panguva imwe cheteyo richiwanirawo vanhu mushonga. Asi UN inoti pachine mutambo sezvo paine vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi matatu vari kurarama nehutachiona pasi rose, vakawanda vari muAfrica. Vanhu vakawanda vanonziwo vari kutapurirwa chirwere ichi zvikuru kuNorth Africa, Middle East nekuRussia. KuRussia kunonzi nyaya iri kupa kuti chirwere chipararire kuramba kutambira nyaya dzechingochani. Asi vakawanda vanoita zvechingochani ava vanonzi vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi zvakanyanya. VaMolokele vanoti Zimbabwe inarowo dambudziko rekusada kupinza ngochani muzvirongwa zvayo. Imwe nyaya iri kupa kuti kurwisa chirwere ichi kunetse inyaya yekuti nyika dzemuAfrica nevanobatsira vave kusunga homwe. Muna Kubvumbi 2001 nyika dzemuAfrica dzakatenderana kuAbuja, Nigeria kuti mumabhajeti adzo dziise mari inosvika zvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana kunyaya dzezvehutano. Asi zvinonzi nyika imwe chete chete ndiyo yakwanisa kuzadzikisa zvido zveAbuja Declaration. VaMolokela vanoti izvi zvapa kuti kurwisa denda iri kunetse. Amai Martha Tolana vanotendawo kuti kushaya mari kuri kupa kupa kuti zvinhu zvikone n’anga murapwa achida. Kutapuriranwa kwechirwere muZimbabwe kwakadzika kubva pazvikamu gumi kubva muzana kusvika pazvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana. Asi zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka sezvo Zimbabwe isina mari yakakwana yekubatsira vanorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS. Zimbabwe iri pachidanho chechishanu panyika dziri pamusoro soro muAfrica pachitariswa nyaya dzekupararira kwemukondombera. Vanhu vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mana vari kurarama nehutachiona muZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reSACU Rowanisa Nhengo Dzaro muAmerica Ruzivo Pamusoro peCovid-19
text: Sangano rinomirirra zvizvarwa zvekuchamhembe kweAfrica zvinogara munharaunda yeD.C, Maryland neVirginia, reSouthern African Community USA, nemusi weSvondo rakakokera hurukuro padandemutande pamusoro pedenda reCovid-19 senzira yekuti veruzhinji vanzwisise pamusoro pedenda iri uye kuti ringabatwa sei. Nhengo yebhodhi reSACU vachiona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano iri, Muzvare Omega Tawonezvi, vanoti sangano ravo rakatora danho iri kuitira kuti veruzhinji vawane ruzivo rwuzere pamusoro pedenda reCovid-19, iro rashungurudza pasi rose. Muzvare Tawonezvi vanoti kuti vanhu vanzwisise kukosha kwenzira dzekudzvirira nadzo pamwe nekurapa denda iri, vakakoka nyanzvi mbiri dzinoti chiremba vari nyanzvi yemishonga yechirungu Dr. Bukhosi Dube vanove chizvarwa chekuZimbabwe, pamwe nemumwe godobori wemishonga yechivanhu anobva kuSouth Africa kuti vatsanangurire veruzhinji pamwe nekupindura mibvunzo yaive nevanhu. Vamwe vakataurawo pamusangano uyu vanhu vaakapona kubva kudenda iri avo vakagoverawo kune vamwe nzira dzavakashandisa mukurwisana nedenda reCovid-19. Sangano reSouthern African Community USA rinoshandawo nemakanzuru pamwe nehurumende dzematunhu mukubatsira zvizvarwa zvekuAfrica muzvirongwa zvakasiyanasiyana zvinosanganisira zvehutano nezvehupfumi. Muzvare Tawonezi vanoti sangano ravo rine hurongwa hwekuita mimwe misangano nenhaurwa pamusoro pedenda reCovid-19 senzira yekupa ruzivo nedzidziso kunhengo dzavo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voshushikana neKuwanda kweVanhu Vari Kubatwa neCovid-19 Munyika
text:
Vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kushushikana zvikuru nekukwira kuri kuita huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Vanhu vakawanda vataura neStuduio7 kuChiredzi vanoti huwandu huri kubudiswa hwevanhu vari kubatwa neCovid-19 kwemazuva mana apfuura huri kuvatyisa sezvo guta iri raramba riri roga rine vanhu vakawanda vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi zvichienzaniswa nemamwe maguta mudunhu rose reMasvingo. Dzimwe nzvimbo mudunhu reMasvingo dziri kubuda dzisina kana munhu
mumwe chete anobatwa nechirwere ichi panoongororwa vanhu zuva nezuva. Musi wechipiri 8 Chikumi pavanhu gumi nemumwe vakawanikwa vaine
chirwere ichi mudunhu rose reMasvingo, vapfumbamwe vaiva vekuChiredzi
vaviri vari vemudhorobha reMasvingo. Musi weChitatu 9 Chikumi, pavanhu gumi nevapfumbamwe vakabatwa neCovid-19 mudunhu rose, vese vaiva vekuChiredzi uye nezuro musi wa 10 Chikumi, vanhu vapfumbamwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vose ndeve kuChiredzi.

Mumwe mugari wemumusha weTsvovani, VaMalcom Mugodzwa, vanoti vave kutyira hupenyu hwavo.

Mumwewo mugari wemumusha wekwa Zava, VaTiyani Chauke, vanofunga kuti guta ravo riri pedyo nemazambuko ekuenda kunyika dze South Africa neMozambique uko vagari vanobira zvisiri pamutemo nekudaro vanogona
kuuya nechirwere ichi.

Izvi zvatsigirwawo naMuzvare Nyasha Sigauke vachiti ivo hurumende
inofanira kuona kuti vanochengetedza mitemo vapinda mumisha
yemudhorobah iri kuitirakuti vanhu vatevedzere zvisungo zvekuti chirwere
ichi chaisapararire.

Hurumende yati iri kushushikanawo nekukwira kuri kuita chirwere ichi
muChiredzi kunyange hazvo kusati kwave nemunhu arasikirwa nehupenyu.

Mukuru webasa mubazi rezvehutano muMasvingo, Dr Amedus Shamu, vanoti hurumende iri kuita tsvakurudzo yekuti ione kuti chi chiri kukonzera kukwira kwechirwere ichi muChiredzi. Asi mutauriri wekomiti yeCovid-19 Task Force muMasvingo, VaRodgers Irimayi, vati kukwira uku kuri kukonzerwa nevanhu vari kubva kwakasiyana siyana vachinotsvaga mabasa ekukohwa nzimbe muminda yeTongaart Hullert nevamwe varimi. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vana vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yese, uye vanhu makumi matanhatu nevana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere munyika yose vave zviuru makumi matatu
nezvipfumbamwe nemazana mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu, 39 496. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vava chiuru chimwe chete nemazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nevatanhatu, 1 626. Vanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevaviri vakaibawa nhomba
yekutanga nezuro izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevabaiwa nhomba yekutanga pamazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe ezviuru nemazana mana nemakumi mashanu nevavviri 690 452. Vanhu zviuru zvina nemazana mapfumbamwe nemamkumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe chete 4 991 vakabaiwa homba yepiri nezuro, izvo zvakasvitsa
vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yepiiri pa zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi mapfumambawe nezvipfumamwe nemakumi mashanu nevana, 399 054. Zimbabwe inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana, 60%,
zvevanhu vari munyika senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere
cheCovid-19. Kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe iine chirongwa ichi, nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti kubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kuchanetsa sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kutadza kubayiwa nhomba yekutanga munzvimbo dzakawanda, sezvo nhomba idzi dziri kushaikwa mumatunhu akawanda munyika. Zvichakadaro, hurumende yeAmerica yazivisa kuti ichabatsira Zimbabwe nemari yekurwisa denda reCovid-19 inotangira pamamiriyoni makumi manomwe nemashanu emadhora kusvika pazana nemakumi
mashanu emamiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica. No media source currently available

headline: Vana Chiremba Vanoti Havasi Kuzoita Basa Kusvika Zvinonetsa Zvagadziriswa
text: Vana chiremba vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara huye havasi kuzodzokera kumabasa kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Vana chiremba vaudza vatori venhau kuti zvinovasuwisa zvakanyanya kuti vasvitsa mazuva gumi nemaviri vasiri kuenda kubasa uku hurumende isiri kumboedza kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association, Dr Elias Muzoremba, vati vanoshungurudzika zvikuru vachishanda muzvipatara zvisina zvikwanisiro zvakakwana. Vatiwo muzvipatara zvehurumende hamuna mishonga izvo zvinoita kuti kunyange vakaona varwere, havana zvavanokwanisa kuvabetsera nazvo. VaMuzoremba vatiwo vanachiremba vazhinji havasi pamabasa kunyange hazvo gurukota rezveutano, VaObadiah Moyo, vakaudza makurukota ehurumede neChipiri kuti vana chiremba vashoma ndovari kuramwa mabasa. Munyori musangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Asssociation, VaMthabisi Anele Bhebhe, vati zvinosuwisa kuti matambudziko avari kuchema nawo vanogarotaura nezvawo gore negore asi hurumende haisi kuagadzirisa. VaBhebhe vati vana chiremba vekumatunhu vabatanawo nana chiremba vanga vari pakuramwa mabasa. VaBhebhe vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa dambudziko rekushaikwa kwezvekushandisa muzvipatara pamwe nekuona kuti vanachiremba vararamawo hupenyu hwakanaka. Vana chirembawo vari kuti mari dzemihoro dzavari kuwana hadzikwani uye vanoda kuti hurumende ivabhadharewo nemari yekuAmerica. Gurukota rezveutano, VaObadiah Moyo, vakaudza vatori venhau nezuro mushure medare remakurukota ehurumende kuti havasi kuzobhadhara vana chiremba nemari yekunze. VaMoyo vakatiwo vakaita hurukuro nana chiremba uye vakati vazhinji vari kumabasa izvo zvarambwa nanachiremba. No media source currently available

headline: Vakapotsa Vafa neCovid-19 Voyambira Vanhu Kuti Vabayiwe Nhomba Nguva Ichiripo
text: Vamwe vanhu vakarwara nechirwere cheCovid-19 vasina kubayiwa nhomba vari kukurudzira vari kuzengurira kubayiwa kuti vaite izvi nekuti vakapotsa vaenda kwamupfiganebwe. Vaimbova mupurisa muZimbabwe Republic Police VaMalvern Mudyiwa mumwe akapona nepaburI retsono mushure mekubatwa nechirwere ichi vasina kunge vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. VaMudyiwa vanoti vakatozonoponera kuchipatara cheParktowen uko vakange vopihwa mweya wekufema kwemavhiki matatu sezvo vainge vozarirwa uye vagarawo vaine chirwere cheasthma. VaMudyiwa vaendera mberi vachiti vakashamiswa apo vakapedza kugeza vakatarisa pachiringiro vakaona mufananidzo wavo wairatidza kuti vainge vasara mapfupa chete. Vamwe vakataura neStudio 7 ndiAmai Namatirai Mutemwa vanogara kuZambia vakabatwa neCovid-19 vagara vaine chirwere chemoyo. Vanoti kunyangwe vakaburitswa muchipatara vachiri kunetseka nekufema uye vakanzi nachiremba vavo kana vave nani vabayiwe nhomba yeCovid-19. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare kuTynwald North VaProvidence Moyo vanoti vakabhadhara mari yakawanda zvikuru kuti varapwe chirwere ichi vari kumba kwavo. Vanoti chirwere chavasiya vasinganyatsogone kumira kwenguva yakareba zvekuti kuti vaende kuri kubayiwa nhomba kune vanhu vakawanda zvinovanetsa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano avo varikuita ongororo yemishonga yeCovid19 Muzvare Miriam Chemhanza vanoti vakabayiwa nhomba vakatapurirwa chirwere ichi havazonyanye kurwara sevasina. Nyanzvi munayay dzezvehutano Dr Tinashe Gede vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vabaiwe nhomba yeCovid 19 uye kuti vasateerera zvinobuda pamadandemutande zvisingabvi kunyanzvi dzehutano pamusoro penhomba dze Covid-19 sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kupedzisira vapinda muna taisireva. Vaendera mberi vachiti panguva ino yeCovid-19, chakakosha kubaiwa nhomba yechirwere ichi nekutevedzera kurudziro yeWorld Health Organisation yekuti vanhu vapfeke mamasiki, vageze mawoko uye vagare vakataramukana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. Pane gwaro rakaburitswawo nehurumende rinonzi “Covid 19 Admissions and Community Deaths by Vaccination Status,” riri kutsinhirawo kuti vanhu vari kufa zvakanyanya nechirwere cheCovid 19 vanhu vasina kubaiwa nhomba. Gwaro iri rinotiwo vana vadiki vave kunyanya kubatwawo nemhando yeCovid-19 iri kutenderera munyika yeDelta variant. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Voenda Kunobayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 Vachibhadhara Mari
text: Vamwe vagari vekuMasvingo vava kuona zviri nani kuenda kunobayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 munzvimbo dzinobhadhariswa mari sezvo vasiri kubatsirwa munzvimbo dzinobayiwa vanhu nhomba pasina muripo. Mumwe mugari wemumusha weRujeko, VaKnowledge Matumba,vati vakandobayiwa nhomba kuchipatara chisiri chehurumende nekuti vakapedza masvondo maviri vachienda kunomira mumutstse asi vachitadza kubayiwa sezvo zvipatara zvehurumende zviri kubaya vanhu vashoma pazuva. VaMatumba vati kuzvipatara zvisiri zvehurumende hakuna mitsetse uye vanhu vanobhadhariswa mari inosvika madhora maviri ekuAmerica iyo yakatarwa nehurumende. Mumwe mugari, VaJohanes Chihwani, avo vati vakabayiwawo kuchipatara chakazvimiririra vati kunyange kuchibhadhriswa, mari yacho ishoma uye haupedzi nguva yakareba wakamirira kubayiwa. Mutauriri weZimbabwe National Family Planning Council muMasvingo, VaHebert Chikosi, vati vanhu vazhinji vari kuuya kuzobaiwa nesangano ravo senzira yekutiza mitsetse kuzvipatara zvehurumende. Chimwe chipatara chakazvimirira cheCIMAS, chiri kubayawo vanhu muMasvingo asi chinobaya nhengo dzacho dziri pachirongwa chekurapiwa chemedical Aid. Mumwe mushandi ataura ne Studio 7 paCIMAS aramba kudomwa nezita rake nekuti haabvumidzwi kutaura nevatori venhau ati nhengo dzavo zhinji dziri kubayiwa nyore dzisingabhadariswi. Muridzi weMakurira Private Hospital, Dr Phenias Makurira, vati zvipatara zvakazvimiririra zviri kubetsera hurumende chaizvo kutapudza huwandu hwevanoda kubayiwa nhomba vachiti chipatara chavo chiri kutangawo kubaya vanhu svondo rinouya. Mutauriri weCovid-19 Taskforce muMasvingo, VaRodgers Irimayi, vati hurumende inotenda kubatsirwa kwairi kuitwa nevezvipatara zvakazvimirira uye inokurudzira vanhu kuti vaende ikoko senzira yekutapudza huwandu kuzvipatara zvehurumende. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuwedzera nzvimbo dzinobayiwa vanhu nhomba pamwe nekutenga nhomba dzakawanda. Nezuro vanhu makumi maviri nevaviri vakafa nechirwe che Covid-19 munyika izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vanhu vafa pazviuru zvina nemazana maviri nemakumi maviri, 4 220. Vanhu mazana matatu nemakumi masere nevatanhatu, 386 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose pazviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezviviri nemazana maviri nemakumi masere nevasere 122 288. Vanhu vabayiwa nhoba yekutanga munyika vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana maviri nemakumi manonwe nechimwe nemazana manomwe nemakumi maviri nevapfumbamwe, 2 271 729. Vabiawa nhomba yepiri vave miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mana nemakumi maviri nezvinomwe nezana nemakumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe, 1 427 159. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekurwisa denda reCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Dzidziso Pamusoro peCOVID-19 Kune Vachadzidzisa Veruzhinji Yotambirwa neMufaro
text: Bazi rezvehutano neMuvhuro rakazivisa kuti huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwakanga hwasvika pazana nemakumi matatu nevashanu kana kuti 135, kuchitiwo vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vasvika pazviuru zvishanu nemazana matatu ane vasere kana kuti 5 308. Bazi iri rakati vanhu vakanga vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi kusvika neMuvhuro vakanga vasvika pazviuru zvitatu nemazana masere ane makumi mana nevasere kana kuti 3 848, izvo zvakasiya vanhu chiuru nemazana matatu nemakumi maviri nevashanu kana kuti 1 325 vari ivo vachine chirwere ichi munyika yose. Mukuedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi munyika, bazi rezvehutano rakabatana nesangano reUnited Nations Population Fund (UNFPA) riri kupa zvidzidzo kuvanhu vachazonodzidzisawo vamwe pamusoro pemabatirwo anofanirwa kuitwa Covid-19 uye kuti chirwere ichi chingadzivirirwa sei kuti chisapararira. Zvidzidzo izvi zviri kuitirwa kuDomboshawa, uye vari kupinda muzvidzidzo izvi vanozotarisirwa kunodzidzisawo vamwe vari mune zvehutano mumapoka avo, avo vanozodzidzisawo vamwe munharaunda dzavagere. Bazi iri razivisa kuburikidza neTiwtter kuti vapinda muzvidzidzo izvi vanhu vabva kubazi rezvehutano, kumapurisa nemauto, uyewo vamwe vabva kumasangano akazvimirira. Mukuru wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti hurongwa hwekudzidzisa vadzidzisi uhwu hwakakosha zvikuru sezvo huchizobatsira kuti dzidziso pamusoro pechirwere ichi izokwanisa kupararira nenyika yose. VaRusike vakurudzirawo kuti dzidziso pamusoro pechirwere cheCovid-19 iwandire pamwe nekupararira kunzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji pamwe nekumaruwa, uko vanoti veruzhinji vanenge vari kuratidza kuti havasi kuteerera kurudziro dzebazi rezvehutano pamwe neWorld Health Organisation dzekuti vazvivhare miromo nemhino, kugeza maoko, pamwe nekusiya mukaha pakati pavo nevamwe. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, Johns Hopkins University Hospital yemuno muAmerica, iyo iri kuongorora chirwere ichi inoti pasi rose vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri neimwe nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe negumi nezvisere, kana kuti 21 918 000 vabatwa nechirwere ichi, icho chaurayawo vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nezvina nemazana manomwe, kana kuti 774, 700. America ndiyo ichiri pamusoro pahuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19, avo vadarika mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana mana nemakumi mana nezvina, kana kuti 5, 444, 000 Vanhu vafa muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi manomwe, kana kuti 170, 000. MuAfrica vanhu vanodarika miriyoni nezviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvisere, kana kuti 1,128 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi, kuchitiwo vashaya vadarika zviuru makumi maviri nezvishanu nemazana masere, kana kuti 25, 800. Vanhu vapona kubva kuchirwere ichi vadarika zviuru mazana masere nemakumi mana nezvitanhatu, kana kuti 846, 000. South Africa ndiyo iri pamusoro muAfrica iine vanhu vanodarika mazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe ezviuru, kana kuti 590, 000 vabatwa nacho. Vanhu vafa nechiwere ichi muSoiuth Africa vadarika zviuru gumi nechimwe nemazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 11, 900.

headline: Kushungurudzwa kweZvizvarwa zveKunze Zvichirambidzwa Kupinda muZvipatara neChikwata cheOperation Dudula muSouth Africa kwoenderera Mberi
text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa zvinoti zvinhu hazvichina kumira zvakanaka sezvo nyaya dzekushungurudzwa nezvizvarwa zvenyika iyi dziri kuenderera mberi, kunyange hazvo hurumende dzenyika mbiri idzi dziri kuti dziri kutaurirana. Nhengo dzechikwata cheOperation Dudula, icho chiri kurwisa kuti zvizvarwa zvekunze kweSouth Africa zvibude munyika iyi, dzaenderera mberi nekurambidza vekunze kupinda muzvipatara nemakiriniki zvehurumende zviri muJohannesburg nemuPretoria. Chikwata ichi changa chakamira pamikova yemakiriniki ari muJohannesburg anosanganisira Hillbrow Community Health Centre, uye chinonzi chakatanga kurambidza vekunze kupinda muzvipatara neMuvhuro apo chakavhara mukova wechipatara chikuru cheKalafong Provincial Tertiary Hospital chiri mudunhu re Gauteng. Nhengo dzebato rinopikisa reEconomic FreedomFighters (EFF) dzinonzi dzanga dziri pachipatara ichi neChitatu dzakagarira veOperation Dudula ava kuti vasarambidza varwere kupinda muchipatara ichi. Izvi zviri kuuya mushure mekunge mumwe mukuru wezvehutano mudunhu reLimpopo, Dr. Phophi Ramathuba svondo rapera vanyadzisa chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chairwara chiri mune chimwe chipatara mudunhu iri vachiti vekunze vari kupedzera vemuSouth Africa mishonga nezvikwanisiro. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende kanawo mapurisa panyaya iyi. Asi chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muPretoria muSouth Africa, Mufundisi Richard Moyo, avo vari kutevera zviri kuitika, vanoti nhau iyi inhau inosiririsa uye kurwadza kuona zviri kuitwa vekunze nezvizvarwa zvaSouth Africa, uchiona kuti vari kushungurudzwa ava vanenge vari varwere kana vari kuperekedza varwere. Mufundisi Moyo vanoti kunyange hazvo mapurisa ari kuzama kubatsira, havaoni ari kuita zvinoita kuti kushungurudzwa uku kumiswe, vachiti vanopa mhosva yose iyi kuhurumende yeSouth Africa, iyo vanoti haisi kumisa chikwata cheOperation Dudula. headline: MDC Alliance Yokumbira Musangano neZEC
text: Mubatanidzwa unopikisa weMDC Alliance wanyora tsamba kuZimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC uchikumbira kuita musangano nekomisheni iyi kuti vazeye nyaya dziri kunetsa dzakanangana nesarudzo, idzo dzasarirwa nemazuva makumi maviri nemashanu chete. Mutsamba yanyorwa naVaJameson Timba, avo vari kumiririra vari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika vakamirira MDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa kuZEC, mubatanidzwa uyu unoti uri kuda kuona gwaro richashandiswa pakuvhota uye kuti richachengetedzwa kupi. Mumashoko avo, VaTimba vanotiwo vanodawo gwaro revavhoti rine mifananidzo re Biometric Voter Registration. Sachigaro weZEC Amai Priscilla Chigumba vanoti vakagadzirira kuita musangano nemapato ose ari kukwikwidza musarudzo kuti vazeye zvichemo zvavo. VaChamisa vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter vanoti vanyorerarawo kuvatungamiri venyika dzemuSADC neAfrican Union nezvemamiriro akaita zvinhu muZimbabwe. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaMaxwell Saungweme vanoti zvichemo zvine mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance zvakakosha asi hapachina nguva yekuti zvigadziriswe sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. headline: VaMushowe Vanokundikana Zvakare Kumira Pamberi peKomiti yeParamende
text: Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaChristopher Mushowe, neChina vatadza zvekare kuuya kukomiti yeparamende kuti vazotaura matanho ari kutorwa nehurumende mukugadzirisa mitemo inombunyikidza vatori venhau pamwe nekusunungura masai sai ematerevhizheni. Nhengo dzeparamende kubva kubato rinopikisa pamwe nemasangano anomirira vatori venhau varatidza kutsamwa kukuru nenamaitiro aVaMushowe avo vakatadza kuuya kudare iri svondo rapera mushure mekunge vakokwa nekomiti yeparamende. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, uye vachimirira Mabvuku, VaJames Maridadi veMDC-T, vati kuita kwaVaMushowe kuri kudzorera shure nyaya dzekugadzirisa mitemo inombunyikidza vatapi venhau. Mukuru wesangano rinomiriria nhepfenyuro dzemumatunhu, reZimbabwe Association of Community Radio Stations, Muzvare Vivian Marara, vatiwo zvinoratidza kuti VaMushowe havana chido chekusandura mutemo yekutapwa kwenhau munyika. Muzvare Kholiwe Majama Nyoni veMedia Institute of Southern Africa – Zimbabwe vashorawo kuita kwaVaMushowe. Vatiwo komiti yeparamende iyi haifaniri kurega VaMushowe vachiita madiro aJojina uye inofanira kutora matanho akaoma kuti VaMushowe vauye kudare iri. Vanoona nzvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano Media Alliance of Zimbabwe, VaNigel Nyamutumbu, vati kunyange hazvo vasiri kufara nemaitiro aVaMushowe, vanoonawo sekuti komiti yeparamende iyi haisi kuita basa rayo nemazvo. Pavabvunzwa kuti vachaita sei naVaMushowe, sachigaro wekomiti iyi, VaWilliam Dhewa, vati VaMushowe vabatikana uye vanofanira kupihwa nguva. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMushowe kuti tinzwe kuti sei vari kutadza kuuya kuparamende. Kunyange hazvo mamwe mapazi ehurumende ari kuunza mabhiri kuparamande kuti mitemo iri pasi pawo isaundurwe kuti ifambirane nebumbiro remitemo yenyika, bazi raVaMushowe harina kana bhiri rarakaunza kudare kubva muna 2013 pakagadzwa bumbiro idzva. VaMushowe vange vachitarisirwa kuti taura kuti mitemo yakaita seAccess to Information and Protection of Privacy Act, Broadcasting Services Act nemimwe ichasandurwa riini. VaMushowe vange vachitarisirwawo kutsanangura kuti sei marezenezi eCapitalk neNyaminyami ayo akapihwa kukambani yeKingstons ave kushandiswa nekambani yeZimpapers. Masangano anomiriria vatori venhau azivisa kuti achaita musangano wechimbi chimbi kuti aronge kuti angaite sei naVaMushowe. Zvichakadai, komiti iyi svondo rinouya ichashanyira nhepfenyuro dzose ichiona kuti dziri kushanda sei. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaMwonzora, Votarisirwa Kuita Musangano kuZimbabwe Grounds neVatsigiri Vavo neSvondo
text: Mutungamiri wechimwe chikwata che MDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vari kutarisirwa neSvondo kuita musangano mukuru munhandare yeZimbabwe Grounds mumusha weHighfields wekutsvagira nhengo dzavo rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzema by-election dziri kuitwa mwedzi uno. Mutauriri waVaMwonzora, VaLloyd Damba, vanoti vanotarisira kuti vatsigiri vavo vachabuda nehuwandu hwavo kuenda kumusangano uyu, vachiti havatarisire kuti vangarambidzwa nemapurisa kuunga sezvakamboitika kuEpworth. Panyaya yekuti vanotarisira vanhu vakawanda here misangano yanga ichimboitwa naVaMwonzora yaipindwa nevanhu vashomashoma, vadamba vanoti vanhu havafanirwi kufananidza misangano yaiitirwa mudzimba nemuzvikoro nemusangano mukuru we rally, sezvo zvakatosiyana zvachose. headline: America Inobudisa Gwaro Rinoshora Kutyorwa kweKodzero dzeVanhu muZimbabwe
text: Bazi re America rionoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, re State Department, rabudisa gwaro pamusoro pekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kwarinoti kuri kuitwa nehurumende yeZimbabwe. Gwaro iri, kana kuti Zimbabwe 2020 Human Rights Report, rine mapeji makumi mana nemapfumbamwe (49), uye rinobva muongororo yakaitwa muna 2020. Bazi re State Department rinoti hurumende mu Zimbabwe inouraya vanhu pamusoro pezvamatongerwo enyika, inotsakatikisa vanhu, kutocha vanhu nekusabata vasungwa zvakanaka. Gwaro iri rinoshoravo majeri emunyika, pamwe chete nekushora mabatirwo anoitwa ngochani mu Zimbabwe. Tatadza kubata vanoona nezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, uye vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira. Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kwe Africa, VaDewa Mavhinga, vati hurumende ye Zimbabwe haifanirwi kumirira kunzwa zvinobva kunze kwenyika, vachiti kana hurumende ikaterera pose panochema vana ve Zimbabwe, haizotyori kodzero dzavo nekuti inenge yave kuziva zvisingadiwi nevanhu. headline: Nhengo dzeParamende Dzinotora Mhiko Dzichivimbisa Kushandira Zvido zveVanhu
text: Nhengo dzeparamende dzakakunda musarudzo dzegore rino nhasi dzatora mhiko yekutanga basa dzichivimbisa kuti dzichadzika mitemo inosimudzira magariro everuzhinji munyika pamwe nekuvandudza mitemo yese kuitira kuti ienderane nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Nhengo zhinji dzeparamende dzaudza Studio7 kuti dzinofara chose nekusarudzwa kupinda mudare reparamende uye dzavimbisa kuti dzichaita zvese zvadzaivimbisa vanhu. Mumiri weMazowe South muNational Assembly, VaFortune Chasi veZanu PF, vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti mitemo yese ivandudzwe kuitira kuti ienderane nebumbiro remitemo. Mumiri weMt Pleasant, VaSamuel Banda veMDC Alliance, vatiwo nyika inofanira kuva nemitemo inobata vanhu vese zvakaenzana zvisine kuti munhu ndewebato ripi. Mumiri weHarare West vari nhengo yeMDC Alliance, Muzvare Joana Mamombe, vaudza Studio7 kuti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti nhengo dzeparamende kubva kumapato ese, dzishande pamwe mukudzika mitemo nekuita basa rinobatsira mwana wese weZimbabwe. Mumiriri weGokwe-Nembudziya muNational Assembly, VaJustice Mayor Wadyajena veZanu PF, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanoda kushanda vasingatyityidzirwe nemakurukota ehurumende sezvaiitika muparamende yapfuura. Nhengo yeZanu PF, VaJoseph Chinotimba vekuBuhera South, vanoti vachashanda zvakasimbamukusimudzira vanhu vemudunhu ravo uye vatiwo vanoda kuti Studio7 ichitanga kutepfunyura iri muZimbabwe. Mumiri weGutu North, Amai Yeukai SimbanegaviveZanu PF, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachaedza pese pavanongona napo kuti vanhu vemunzvimbo yavo vawane mabasa. Paramende yagara ichionekwa seisina simba uye ichimanikidzwa kuitwa zvese zvese nemutungamiriri wenyika kana makurukota ake. Asi VaSettlement Chikwinyawa veMDC Alliance vachimirira Mbizo vati izvi hazvisi kuzoitika rwendo rwuno. Munyori weparamende, VaKennedy Chokuda, vagadza nhengo dzese mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe dzedare reNational Assembly nenhengo makumi masere dzeseneti. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson MNangagwa, vanotarisirwa kudomwa nhengo shanu kudare reseneti uye svondo rapfuura vakatodoma vatevedzeri vavo vaviri zvinoreva kuti vasarirwa kudoma nhengo nhatu chete. Matare maviri eparamende aya achagara svondo rinouya kuti asarudze mutauriri weNational Assembly pamwe nemutungamiri wedare reSenate. Pane nzvimbo dzinodarika makumi matatu dzeNational Assembly dziri kupikiswa neMDC Alliance mudare reElectoral Court, zvekuti vari kupikisa ava vakabudirira, vamwe vatoreswa mhiko nhasi vanorasikirwa nenzvimbo dzavo mudare iri, vanenge vanzi vakunda vachitoreswa mhiko yekuti vave nhengo dzedare iri. headline: America Yovimbisa Kudyidzana neAfrican Union Zvine Pundutso Mukati
text: Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha vanoti vatungamiri vemuAfrica vanofanirwa kutambira mashoko aVaJoe Biden zvine mutsindo nerukudzo mukati, uye vafunge zvakadzama kuti vangasimbaradze seyi hukama hwavo nehurumende itsva iri kutonga mu America. Mutungamiri weAmerica, Va Joe Biden, vatumira mashoko avo kuvatungamiri vemu Africa, avo vari kuita musangano wemazuva maviri padandemutande senzira yekuti vanhu vasatapurirane chirwere che Covid-19. VaBiden vaudza musangano weAfrican Union wechimakumi matatu nemana uyu kuti America yakagadzirira kuva sahwira wenyika dzemu Africa mukutsigirana, mukubatana pamwe nekuremekedzana. Vati izvi ndizvo zvinopa America kuti ishanda pamwe nemasangano epasi rose akaita se African Union. Vati pasi rose rinofanirwa kushanda pamwe chete kuitira kuzadzisa "shuviro yeremangwana rakanaka, remangwana rine kukura munyaya dzekutengeserana, kunopa pundutso kunyika dzose." VaBiden, avo vakagadzwa pachigaro chemutungamiri weAmerica mwedzi wapera mushure mekukunda VaDonald Trump veRepublican Party, vati nyika yavo "yakazvipira kuvaka zvakare mushandirapamwe pamwe nekubatsira vanhu vemu Africa pazvinhu zvose zvinosanganisira kurwisa chirwere che Covid-19 uye mukushanda neAfrican Union mukupedza mhirizhonga dziri kuuraya vanhu vakawanda muAfrica yose." Mutungamiri weAmerica atiwo America yakagadzirira kuva sahwira we Africa, uye inodavira zvinoitwa nenyika dzemu Africa. Vatiwo kunyange hazvo paine zvipingaidzo zvihombe, “hapana kupokana kuti nyika dzedu, vanhu vedu, pamwe neAfrican Union, vakazvipira kugadzirisa zvipingaidzo zvose.” No media source currently available Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika pamwe nekufambiswa kwemabhizinesi pasi rose, Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, vanoti vatungamiri vemuAfrica vanofanirwa kutambira mashoko aVa Biden zvine mutsindo nerukudzo mukati, uye vafunge zvakadzama kuti vangasimbaradze seyi hukama hwavo nehurumende itsva iri kutonga mu America. Muzvinafundo Masocha vanoti kuti Zimbabwe idyidzane zvemhando yepamusoro soro munyaya dzemabhizinesi, hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa inofanirwa kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu chinova chinhu chakaita kuti vamwe vakuru vakuru vatemerwe zvirango neAmerica. Muzvinafundo Masocha vanoti Zimbabwe ikaratidza kuti yava kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu uye mapurisa nemasoja ayo achibata vemuZimbabwe zvine chiremera, Zimbabwe inogona kudyidzana nemabhizinesi ekuAmerica nenzira inoita kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimudzirwe. Asi Zimbabwe inoti iri kuomeserwa nekuti yakatorera varungu mapurazi ichiapa kuvanhu vatema. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu PF Yoyambira Vanoda Kuratidzira
text: Zanu PF inoti inomira nemashoko akataurwa nemutungamiri wayo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamusangano wakaitwa nemusi weChishanu mudare rePolitburo yebato iri. VaMnangagwa, avo vanove zvakare mutungamiri wenyika, vakayambira masangano evashandi, machechi, nemasangano akazvimirira, kuti anangane nemabasa awo ari pamutemo, kwete kupindira mune zvematongerwo enyika. VaMangagwa vakatiwo vanozviziva kuti masangano aya ari kushanda nemapato anopikisa muda kuvhiringidza mashandiro ehurumende yavo. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, avo vanoti ichokwadi kuti masangano akazvimirira aya ava kuita zvematongerwo enyika achisiya basa rekuchengetedza kodzero dzevashandi. VaMugwadi vanoti hurumende inozviziva kuti masangano aya ari kuda kuratidzira zvisiri pamutemo, uye mapurisa achange achiita basa rawo nemazvo mukuona kuti hapana anobvumidzwa kutyora mitemo yenyika munguva ino yeCovid-19. VaMugwadi vatiwo sangano guru reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, riri kuita zvematongerwo enyika. Vati mutungamiri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vakamboyedza kuyananisa vatungamiri veMDC vari kunetsana, izvo zvinoburitsa pachena kuti sangano iri rinodyidzana nemapato anopikisa hurumende. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata VaMutasa kanawo MDC kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Asi mutungamiri weAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti sevashandi vane kodzero dziri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika, vanoshushikana zvikuru nemashoko aVaMnangagwa. VaMasaraure vanoti vashandi havasi kuzofa vakanyarara kana hurumende ichitadza kugadzirisa nyaya dzemihoro yavo, uye vacharamba vachitaura zvinyunyuto zvavo. Asi VaMugwadi vati hurumende inonzwisisa zvikuru zvichemo zvevashandi ndosaka yakawedzera mihoro yevashandi vehurumende nezvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana, pamusoro pezvo, ikavapa zvakare madhora ekuAmerica makumi manomwe nemashanu semari yekubatsirikana munguva yekurwisa Covid-19. headline: America Inoti Kutadza Kutonga kwaVaMnangagwa Ndiko Kuri Kuvhiringa Hupfumi hweZimbabwe, Kwete Zvirango
text: America inoti zvirango zvayakatemera vakuru vakuru muZimbabwe hazvisirizvo zviri kukonzera kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyika ichiti hurumende yeZimbabwe ndiyo iri kutadza kutungamira zvakanaka. Izvi zvinotevera gwaro rakaburitswa nenhumwa yeUnited Nations, Amai Alena Douhan, avo vakati zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nehurumende yeAmerica pamwe nedzimwe nyika dzekumavirira zviri kukanganisa raramo yeveruzhinji munyika. Mumiriri weAmerica kusangano reUnited Nations, Ambassador Linda Thomas Greenfield, vaudza vatori venhau nhasi vari kuNew York kuti kutadza kutungamira zvakanaka kwehurumende yeZimbabwe ndiko kuri kukonzera kutambura kweveruzhinji munyika kwete zvirango zvakaiswa nehurumende yavo. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemumiriri wesangano reEuropean Union, VaTimo Olkonnen, kuti tinzwewo divi ravo panyaya yezvirango iyi sezvo pataenda pamhepo vanga vasati vapindura mibunzo yavati tivatumire. Asi EU yakataura munguva pfupi yadarika kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe inofanira kugadzirisa nyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika isati yabvisa zvirango. Muzinda weBritain muZimbabwe wakaburitsa mashoko padandemutande rawo reTwitter mazuva mashomanana adarika uchiti kutengesera pakati peBritain neZimbabwe kuri kufamba zvakanaka zvisinei nezvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vari muZanu PF. Gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vati togozovafonera sezvo vanga vachiti vakabatikana nemusangano weZanu PF wepagore uri kuitirwa kuBindura. Asi vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri weZanu PF, VaMike Bimha, vati zvirango zviri kuonesa pfumvu munhu wese munyika zvisinei nekuti munhu anotsigira baro ripi rezvematongerwo enyika. VaBimha vati Zimbabwe iri kuoneswa ndondo nenyika dzekumavirira nepamusana pekutorwa kwakaitwa minda kubva kuvarimi vechichena ichigoverwa kuvanhu vatema. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzevamatongerwo enyika, VaRashweat Mukundu, vati zvirango zviripo hazvisi zvirango zvehupfumi ndokusaka Zimbabwe ichikwanisa kutengeserana nenyika dzacho dzakaisa zvirango izvi uye vati havaone nyika idzi dzichibvisa zvirango izvi kana Zimbabwe isina kugadzirisa zvikonzero zvakaita kuti zvirango izvi zviiswe kubva pakutanga. Kunyange gwaro raAmai Douhan rakakurudzira kuti America irege kushandisa mutemo weZidera kuti irambe yakaisa zvirango izvi vachiti zvirango izvi hazvisi pamutemo sezvo zvisina kubvumidzwa neUnited Nations Security Council, Amai Greenfield vati hurumende yavo haisi kuzodyira huroyi mukunyara vachiti hurumende yavo icharambawo yakatsika madziro panyaya yekuti kodzero dzevanhu dzicherechedzwe muZimbabwe. Amai Douhan, avo vakanga vari munyika kwemazuva gumi adarika vachiongorora nyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika uye kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nenyika dzekumavirira zviri kukanganisa hupenyu hweveruzhinji zvakadii munyika, vakati ruzhinji rweZimbabwe rwuri kunhonga svosve nemuromo pamusana pezvirango izvi. Amai Douhan vakakurudzira Zimbabwe kuti iite nhaurirano dzechokwadi nenyika dzakatemera zvirango nechinangwa chekuti zvirango izvi zvigobviswa vakatiwo hurumende yeZimbabwe pachayo inofanira kuona kuti munyika maitwa nhaurirano dzemandorokwati munyika pamwe nedzimwe nyika dzakaisa zvirango izvi. Nyika dzakatemera Zimbabwe zvirango dzinosanganisira America, Australia, Britain, Canada, Switzerland pamwe nesangano renyika dziri mugungano reEuropean Union. Amai Douhan vakatarisirwa kusvitsa gwaro rezvavakawana muongororo yavo kumusangano weUnited Nations Human Rights Council uchaitwa muna Gunyana wegore rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: VaMutasa Vanobvuma Kutongwa neKomiti yeZanu-PF
text: Nyaya yekusawirirana mubato reZanu-PF yatanga zvakare mushure mekudzoka munyika kwemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, Amai Grace Mugabe. Kudzoka kwavo nesvondo kwava kureva kuti vaive murongi wemabasa mubato, VaDidymus Mutasa, vanenge votongwa nekomiti yakaumbwa iri kutungamirwa nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko. VaMutasa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachaenda kudare iri. No media source currently available Vamwe vari mukomiti iyi vanosanganisira Amai Mugabe semutungamiri weWomens League, vanoona nezvemabasa ematongwerwo enyika mubato, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, munyori wezvemitemo, VaPatrick Chinamasa, munyori wevechidiki, VaPupurai Togarepi, uye nhengo yePolitburo, VaKembo Mohadi. Mutauriri webato, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vakazivisa svondo rapera kuti kutongwa kwaVaMutasa kunotanga chete kana Amai Mugabe vadzoka kubva kunyika dzekumawirira.

headline: MDC T Yoronga Musangano Mukuru weKupeta Gore kuZimbabwe Grounds
text: Mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC T, VaMorgan Tsvangirai mangwana vari kutarisirwa kutungamira nhengo dzavo pamusangano mukuru wekuvhara gore uchaitirwa munhandare ine nhoroondo yekurwira rusununguko rwevatema yeZimbabwe Grounds iri mumusha weHighfield. Mutauriri weMDC-T VaObert Gutu vanoti chinangwa chikuru chemusangano uyu ndechekutarisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika pari zvino, pasvika hurongwa hwemubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa pakatarisanwa nesarudzo dza2018, pamwe nekutendawo vana veZimbabwe nekushinga kunyange vari mukati mematambudziko makukutu. VaGutu vanoti zvimwe zvicha kurukurwawo ndezvakaitwa nebato ravo mukati megore rino, zvinosanganisira kuratidzira mumatunhu akasiyana-siyana enyika. No media source currently available

headline: HATITYE SRI LANKA: GEMS
text: ari kuLIVERPOOL, England naAbel Ndooka ari muHARARE KAPUTENI wechikwata chenyika chenetball chemaGems — Perpetual Siyachitema — anoti vacharwa semvumba uye vanoda kusimudzira mureza weZimbabwe kumakwishu eVitality Netball World Cup ayo ari kuitirwa kuLiverpool, kuEngland.   Achitaura neKwayedza, Siyachitema anoti maGems achatamba nemwoyo wose kuti vagohwina mitambo yavo vagopedza vari pakati pezvikwata zvikuru zviri kumakwishu aya.   MaGems ari muboka reGroup A umo achasangana nezvikwata zvinoti Australia — iyo inove shasha ine mukombe wenetball — Sri Lanka neNorthen Ireland.   Mutambo wekutanga wechikwata chenyika ichi uriko musi weChishanu chino apo chichasangana neSri Lanka kunhandare yeM&S Bank Arena kuLiverpool Court Two.   Mushure mezvo, maGems achazosangana neAustralia musi weMugovera ozopedzisira neNorthen Ireland musi weSvondo.   Siyachitema anoti kubva zvavakasvika kuEngland, vange vachiongorora mitambo yeSri Lanka iyo yavachasangana navo mumutambo wekutanga ndokuona kuti vatambi vayo varefu zvikuru kusiyana navo sezvo vakati pfupikei.   “Takaongorora chikwata cheSri Lanka, chine vatambi varefu zvikuru kudarika isu asi murairidzi wedu akatsvaga nzira dzekuti tinogona kuvakunda sei.   “Zvekureba kwavo hatisi kuzozvitarisa uye hazvireve kuti vachatikunda, isu ticharwa semvumba mumutambo uyu,” anodaro Siyachitema.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Isu senyika pasi rese tiri pechi13 pakutamba netball saka kumakwishu eVitality Netball World Cup tiri kuda kurwa zvakasimba totamba sechikwata kuti tirpedze tiri mutop 8.”   Achitaura pamusoro perutsigiro rwavakawana kubva kumakambani akasiyana anosanganisira Simbisa Brands, Econet, National Foods nemamwe, Siyachitema anoti zvakavasimudzira morari yavo uye zvave kuvatuma kuti vashande nesimba kumakwishu aya.   “Tinotenda zvikuru makambani ese akatibatsira kuti rwendo rwedu rureruke kuenda kumakwishu aya, zvaisava nyore kudai vasipo saka tinotenda zvikuru.   “Rutsigiro rwatawana rwaunza mufaro kwatiri isu vanasikana veZimbabwe uye zvave kutituma kuti titambe nesimba kumakwishu aya,” anodaro Siyachitema.   Pazvikwata zvese zvemuAfrica, maGems ari kumakwishu aya nezvimwe zvikwata zvinoti South Africa, Uganda neMalawi.   Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Netball Association, Leticia Chipandu, anoti vasikana vemaGems vacharwa vamire mumitambo yavo.   Kubva kare, zvikwata zvizhinji zvaikwikwidza kumakwishu epasi rose akasiyana hazvina kumbobvira zvauya nemukombe izvo zvakapedzisira kuitwa nechikwata chemaGolden Girls icho chakahwina menduru yegoridhe kumaOlympics mugore ra1980.   Asi, Chipandu anoti rwendo rwuno zviri kuzoshanduka.   “Chandinovimbisa ndechekuti hatisi kungoburitswa mumutambo uyu uchangotanga, izvo kwete bodo.   “Vasikana vachatamba kusvika kumagumo uye ndinokuvimbisai kuti tichaunza mufaro mukuru kunyika yedu kubva kumakwishu aya,” anodaro Chipandu.

headline: Hatina chekutaura: Zifa
text: MUTAURIRI weZimbabwe Football Association – Xolisani Gwesela – anoti havana chekutaura zvichitevera kumbomiswa basa kwaitwa vatungamiri veZifa neSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) nhasi.   Achibvunzwa neKwayedza kuti Zifa inoti kudii nedanho ratorwa neSRC, Gwesela anoti, “Handikwanise kupindura mubvunzo iwoyo, kana muchida kuziva zvakawanda taurai neSRC mubvunze zvose vanokubatsirai.”   Nhasi mangwanani SRC yazivisa nezvekumisa kwayaita basa bhodhi reZifa nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakawanda izvo iri kupomera sangano renhabvu iro rinotungamirirwa naFelton Kamambo.   Zvimwe zvezvikonzero zvamisirwa Zifa basa zvinosanganisira kusashandisa nemazvo mari yeveruzhinji pamwe nekutadza kupa umboo hwekuti mari iyi yakashandiswei, kutumira zvikwata zvenyika kunokwikwidza kumitambo yakasiyana kunze zvisina kupihwa mvumo sezvinodiwa pasi pemutemo wekurwisa denda reCovid-19 uye mashoko ekushungurudzwa kwevaridzi vepembe vechidzimai.   Nyika yamirira kuona kuti sangano reFifa richatora matanho api kuZimbabwe sezvo isingatendere kuti hurumende dzipindire munyaya dzenhabvu.

headline: Highlanders Yopemberera Kusvitsa Makore Makumi Mapfumbamwe
text: Pamusoro pezvo kuchave nemabiko ekupembera kusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe kwechikwata cheHighlanders uko mukuru wacho, VaNadumiso Gumede, vakavimbisa mumimhanzi pamwe nenhabvu zvepamusoro soro muBarbourfields Stadium neMugovera. Vatsigiri venhabvu vatarisana nemabiko anofadza mukupera kwesvondo. Kubva kumitambo yemuAfrica kusvika kumakwikwi eZimbabwe National Army Charity Challenge, kuchave nemachikichori enhabvu ayo anga achingotaurwa nezvawo svondo rese. Pamusoro pezvo kuchave nemabiko ekupembera kusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe kwechikwata cheHighlanders uko mukuru wacho, VaNadumiso Gumede, vakavimbisa mumimhanzi pamwe nenhabvu zvepamusoro soro muBarbourfields Stadium neMugovera. No media source currently available Asi mutambo uri pamuromo pevazhinji ndeuyo uri kuSouth Africa apo chikwata cheChicken Inn chiri kutarisira kudimbura muswe chikwata chemaBrazilains icho chiri kuparadza zvimwe zvikwata. Mutambi ane mukurmbira muZimbabwe, asi achitambira Memelodi Sundowns, Khama Billiart, achenge ari mumutambo uyu kunyange hazvo asina kupinda mune wekutanga nekukuvara. Chicken Inn yakakuanda 1-0 mumutambo iwoyu asi muteveri wenhabvu, VaLesvison Ndudzi, vanoti ikozvino maGamecocks anofanira kungwarira Billiart Vachitarisa matambiro akaita maGamecocks mumutambo wekutanga, muongorori wezvemitambo ane mukurumbira, VaAndrew Rwodzi, vanoti havasi kunyanyotyira Chicken Inn. Vatsigiri vechikwata cheHighlanders vanogara muSouth Africa vanosvika zviuru zviviri vavimbisa kuti vachange vari munhandare vachikuzirira Chicken Inn. Chimwe chikwata chemuZimbabwe cheHarare City chiri kuMadagascar uko chiri kusangana neAS Adema kwete muCaf Champions League, asi muCaf Confederation Cup. Harare City iri kutingamira 3-2 kubva mumutambo wekutanga zvekuti murairidzi wechikwata ichi, Taurai Mangwiro, anoti haasi kuona vachinetseka kukunda mumutambo wechipiri uyu. Mutambo wekugumisira uchange uri muRufaro Stadium umo Dynamos iri kusangana neZPC Kariba mumutambo wekota fainari yeZimbabwe National Army Charity Challenge. Kunyange hazvo mune manyukunyuku muchikwata ichi, chikwata ichi change chichingotamba mumutambo wehushamwari zvekuti uyu ndiwo mutambo ucharatudza kusimba kwacho. Mutambo uyu wauya mumusha macho musina kumira zvakanaka mushure mekunge murairdzi wacho, Jorge Silva wekuBrazil, nezuro akarova mutori wemifananidzo yepaterevhizheni yeZimbabwe Braodcasting Corporation. Svondo rapera, Silva zvekare akakandirana makobvu nematete nemurairdzi wevabati vepagedhe wechikwata ichi, Gif Muzadzi, izvo zvave kuitisa mibvunzo mumabatiro ebasa rake. Asi vatsigiri venhabvu vari kutarisira kuti chikwata cheChicken Inn pamwe necheHarare City zvichavasiya vachipemberera pachapera mitambo yavo.

headline: FC Platinum Yokurudzirwa Kukunda Mitambo yepaMusha Kuti Ibudirire muMakwikwi eCaf Champions League
text: Chikwata cheFC Platinum chirikuvhura makundano enhabvu egore rino asi paine mibvunzo. Vanotevera mutambo wenhabvu havasi kugutsikana nematambiro arikuita FC Platinum pamusha payo mumitambo yeCaf Champions League vakatarisana nemutambo mukuru neOrlando Pirates yekuSouth Africa iyo yakatora mukombe uyu muna 1995. Nhoroondo yenhabvu muAfrica inotaura kuti zvikwata zvinokunda nemutsindo pamusha ndizvo zvinowanzoenderera mberi nemakundano asi matambiro eKugona Kunenge Kudada muMandava Stadium asimudza mibvunzo mumukana wavo wekusvika kuma kota fainari. FC Platinum yakatatarika zvinotyisa neCnaps yekuMadagascar ndokuzokunda 1-0 mumutambo uyo vaitarisirwa kukanda zvibodzwa pamadiro, ndokuzoita zvekare mangange 0-0 ne Otoyo Oho yekuCongo. Muteveri wenhabvu VaFrancis Mwendamberi vanoti Kugona Kunenge Kudada inofanira kuwedzera mwando pamatambiro ayo pamusha kana ichida kubudirira mumakwikwi aya. Pamusoro peOrlando Pirates, FC Platinum iri mugungano rimwechete ne Esperance yekuTunisia iyo ine mukombe uyu pamwe ne Horoya yeku Guinea. Zvikwata zviviri zvinopedza zviri pamusoro mugungano iri ndizvo zvinoenderera mberi nemakwikwi aya. Muteveri wechikwata cheDynamos VaObert Masvotore vanoti FC Platinum isatarise mazita kana mukurumbira une zvikwata zvavari kusangana nazvo. Mumwe muteveri wemutambo uyu VaTatenda Makazhu ndivo vanofunga kuti Kugona Kunenge Kudada inokwanisa kusvika mufainari yemakundano aya. Asi murairidzi wePirates Milutin Sredojevic audza mapepanhau ekuSouth Africa kuti ari kutya kutamba nechikwata cheFC Platinum nenyaya yekuti chikwata chitsva mumakundano aya uye ati anoremekedza murairidzi wacho Norman Mapeza zvakanyanya. Ati sezvo Pirates iri kutamba neFC Platinum mumutambo wekutanga kuMandava Stadium kuZvishavane, zvinonetsa zvikuru kuenda iko nemugwagwa. Asi Pirates iri kubheja kuti inosimudza mukomb weChampions League kechipiri munhoroondo yayo. Asi FC Platinum ichange isina mutambi akatamba zvinonwisa mvura mwaka uno kana kuti Soccer Star of the Year, Rodwell Chinyengetere, uyo ave kuenda kunotambira Baroka FC ku South Africa naWinston Mhango uyo arikuenda kuSouth Africa zvekare. Kugona Kuenge Kudada irikutarisira kusvika kana kudarika chidanho chakasvikwa neDynamos iyo yakasvika mufainari yeCaf Champions League muna 1998 nemuma semi finari muna 2008.
